name: Chop Shop
description:
Team Scrap's Capstone project from the University of Wisconsin-Stout, 2020


Description:

Half "Twisted Metal" half "Mario Kart", battle your way through this fun, 1 - 4 local multiplayer, physics based driving game. Knock pieces off your opponents and steal or scrap their parts to make the biggest, baddest, most ultimate ride.

----

Please feel free to list any issues you find in the comments down below.
